item.title: Code style
item.description: A consistent code style is important for everyone. Pull requests are only accepted if they follow our code style. But don't worry, it's not that difficult. The main points are: Reformat your code with clang-format. There is a .clang-format file in the repository root. Function and method names are in camelCase Class and struct names are in PascalCase Namespaces, files and directories are named in snake_case Headers have the extension .
